mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_addr, member_coord_x, member_coord_y, member_nickname, member_email, member_type, member_reg_num, member_info, member_active, member_created_at, work_area_id, member_verified FROM member_tb WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_pw = #{memberPw}

SELECT member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_addr, member_coord_x, member_coord_y, member_nickname, member_email, member_type, member_reg_num, member_info, member_active, member_created_at, work_area_id, member_verified FROM member_tb ORDER BY member_created_at DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}

SELECT member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_addr, member_coord_x, member_coord_y, member_nickname, member_email, member_type, member_reg_num, member_info, member_active, member_created_at, work_area_id, member_verified FROM member_tb WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT m.member_id, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_addr, member_coord_x, member_coord_y, member_nickname, member_email, member_type, member_reg_num, member_info, member_active, member_created_at, work_area_id, member_verified, img_location, img_filename, img_filename, img_filetype, img_updated_at, resume_location, resume_filename, resume_filetype, resume_updated_at, resume_open FROM member_tb m LEFT JOIN img_tb i ON m.member_id = i.member_id LEFT JOIN resume_tb r ON m.member_id = r.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_tb (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_addr, member_coord_x, member_coord_y, member_nickname, member_email,member_type,member_reg_num, member_info,member_active, work_area_id, member_verified) values (#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberName},#{memberBirth},#{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddr},#{memberCoordX},#{memberCoordY},#{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail},#{memberType},#{memberRegNum},#{memberInfo},1, #{workAreaId},#{memberVerified})
mapper.update: UPDATE member_tb SET member_pw= #{memberPw} , member_name=#{memberName}, member_birth= #{memberBirth}, member_phone = #{memberPhone}, member_addr = #{memberAddr}, member_coord_x = #{memberCoordX} , member_coord_y = #{memberCoordY}, member_nickname = #{memberNickname}, member_email = #{memberEmail}, member_info = #{memberInfo} ,work_area_id= #{workAreaId},member_verified = #{memberVerified} WHERE member_id= #{memberId}
UPDATE member_tb SET member_active=0 WHERE member_id= #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.member_id, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_addr, member_nickname, member_email, member_info, work_area_id, resume_updated_at, resume_open, (SELECT suggest_created_at FROM suggest_tb WHERE member_id = A.member_id AND company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY suggest_created_at DESC LIMIT 1) AS last_suggested FROM member_tb AS A JOIN resume_tb AS B ON A.member_id = B.member_id WHERE A.work_area_id= #{workAreaId} AND B.resume_open=1 ORDER BY resume_updated_at DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO img_tb (member_id, img_location, img_filename, img_filetype, img_updated_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{imgLocation}, #{imgFilename}, #{imgFiletype}, default)
UPDATE img_tb SET img_location = #{imgLocation}, img_filename= #{imgFilename}, img_filetype = #{imgFiletype}, img_updated_at = NOW() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

INSERT INTO resume_tb (member_id, resume_location, resume_filename, resume_filetype, resume_updated_at, resume_open) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{resumeLocation}, #{resumeFilename}, #{resumeFiletype}, default, #{resumeOpen})
